highlights: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform, enhancing product discovery and navigation for millions of users across multiple regions
Optimized ReactJS and Redux components by implementing efficient state management, reducing re-rendering by 30% and improving overall responsiveness.
Enhanced UI performance with lazy loading, efficient state management, and code splitting, cutting page load time by 35%.
Engaged in code reviews, architecture discussions and documented technical processes to ensure best practices and maintainability
Assisted in development of the front end of a web based product DB Dash application using MERN stack framework from scratch with a team of 5 members.
Integrated Google Firebase for secure user authentication and login
Collaborated with team members using version control systems such as Git to organize modifications and assign tasks.
Created reusable components using React following industry standards for writing high quality readable code using different NPM packages & libraries.
Experimented various Open Source data grid tables for integration.
